description: Palindromic primes in base 10 and base 16.
comments: Intersection of A002385 and A029732. -  _Michel Marcus_, Jun 09 2013
prog: (PARI) ispal(v) = {for(i=1, #v\2, if (v[i] != v[#v-i+1], return(0));); return(1);}; lista(nn) = {forprime(p=2, nn, if (ispal(digits(p, 10)) && ispal(digits(p, 16)), print1(p, ", ")););}  \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 09 2013
author: _Patrick De Geest_ and _Warut Roonguthai_ Aug 15 1998.
